page.title: 10WRITTLE, VILLAGE GREEN
page.content: Writtle Green is one of the prettiest village greens in Essex. It is in the centre of Writtle,which is about 4km. from the nearest town, Chelmsford and 45km. from London. It is still very much part of everyday life for the people who live in Writtle. The grassed area is used as a playground by the children who can regularly be seen playing chase, football or cricket and as a pretty way to church or a pleasant place for walking the dogs by adults. Families often visit the Green to feed the ducks on the pond,especially in Spring when the surface of the water is dotted with fluffy yellow and brown chicks. Sometimes people come just to sit on the benches and enjoy the willows and peaceful atmosphere. The annual fete also is held there.
